title: Gawa Ghee
shortDescription: Ghee made from grass-fed cow's milk.
description: Traditional desi ghee made without chemicals. Pure and aromatic, perfect for cooking and boosting health naturally.

title: Chak Honey
description: Collected from native hives, this pure honey is delicious and safe. Perfect for regular healthy consumption.

title: Mustard Flower Honey
description: Pure honey harvested from blooming mustard fields. Naturally sweet, aromatic, and full of nutritional value.

title: Sundarbans Honey
shortDescription: Raw honey collected from the Sundarbans forest.
description: Wild raw honey from Sundarbans forest. No preservatives, rich in taste and health benefits.

title: Black Seed Honey
shortDescription: Health-boosting honey blended with black seed.
description: Natural honey mixed with black seed. Strengthens immunity and offers numerous health benefits for all ages.

title: Mustard Oil
shortDescription: Pure mustard oil processed in traditional Ghani.
description: 5kg family-size mustard oil made using traditional Ghani methods. Aromatic, nutritious, and rich in Ayurvedic value.

title: Sweet Yogurt
description: Traditional Bangladeshi sweet yogurt made with milk and sugar. Perfect for desserts, guests, or festive meals.

title: Sour Yogurt
description: Sour yogurt with a tangy taste. Ideal for mashed dishes or curries — fresh and healthy.

title: Cow Milk
shortDescription: Pure cow milk with no added water.
description: Fresh, chemical-free cow milk rich in calcium. Safe for children and great for everyday nutrition.

title: Olive Oil
description: High-quality olive oil for cooking, skincare, and hair. Extra virgin and cold-pressed for purity.

title: Olive Oil
shortDescription: Everyday use olive oil in small pack.
description: 500gm olive oil — ideal for small families and daily use in cooking and beauty care.

title: Olive Oil
description: Compact 250gm bottle of extra virgin olive oil. Easy to store and use for everyday needs.
